name: @engineerd/bertrand
description: A dynamic site generator that renders markdown

scripts.build-optimized: wasm-pack build --target web --no-typescript --release && wasm-opt pkg/bertrand_bg.wasm -Oz -o pkg/bertrand_bg.wasm
scripts.build-dev: wasm-pack build --target web --no-typescript --dev && wasm-opt pkg/bertrand_bg.wasm -Oz -o pkg/bertrand_bg.wasm
scripts.dev: npm run build-dev && npm run bundle && http-server -b -g
scripts.optimized: npm run build-optimized && npm run bundle && http-server -b -g
